name: Solitaire Farm: Card Game
description:
Take part in the exciting journey! Help Alice experience this absolutely stunning adventure, by solving challenging solitaire puzzles. Explore your grandparents’ home and meet different characters. Train your brain by puzzling out lots of solitaire card levels.

Play a rich variety of Solitaire levels to restore the farm. It doesn’t matter if you like classic solitaire or the tripeaks, gameplay will excite you anyway. Don’t worry, if you never play solitaire before - it’s quite easy to learn. Think about your strategy, choose the right cards and claim rewards. You are free to use extra cards and boosters, if needed! Also, don’t forget to look for farm animals - these adorable friends of ours can help you throughout gameplay.

Discover the wonderful farm world. Grow and harvest crops in the garden to feed your farm pets and receive goods. Make your design decisions, to create your own farm decor. Relax and enjoy the view of the farm you design and if you want, visit your friends, to share true gardeners’ experience. Earn daily rewards or take part in special events - there is a gameplay for everyone. Hurry up, to enjoy this free to play world of entertainment!

The game features:
● Gameplay: Win a solitaire level, get rewards and, take part in this stunning farm adventure
Hundreds of solitaire levels, with boosters and unique cards
● Sharp your brain, solving challenging solitaire puzzles
● Dozens of in-game characters, which will help in farm reconstruction
● Lovely farm animals, like a turkey, cows, chickens will create the farm mood
● Different areas in the farm, with unique gameplay, exciting animations and addictive story
● Various crops to grow and harvest, to get special rewards
● A community of friend, who you can ask for help and send lives
● A super free game you can even play offline


Solitaire Farm is absolutely free to play.
Enjoying Solitaire Farm? Learn more Alice adventure in Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/granny.farm.game/
If you have any issue contact our support by sending an email to support@4enjoy.com
